assets.notes: Standard animated loading spinner from a WordPress plugin (Contact Form 7). This asset will be inherently replaced by a new theme or form solution and holds no unique brand value.

shots: Professional headshots of all team members, consistent style and background
Candid shots of team members collaborating or in a professional office setting
Exterior and interior shots of the firm's office, highlighting key features and professional environment
Environmental portraits of key attorneys, showcasing their expertise or personality in a relevant context
photographyBrief.style: Authentic, professional, approachable yet authoritative, with clean lighting and compositions. Emphasize trust and competence. Avoid sterile or overly staged imagery.

images.description: Abstract background patterns or textures incorporating the evolved brand blue and red, along with sophisticated, modern complementary tones. These should replace the generic gray backgrounds.
images.purpose: To create a more contemporary and branded visual foundation for various sections and enhance visual interest without relying on generic stock or photography where not needed.

images.description: Custom icon set for 'Areas of Practice' and other service-related sections, designed in a clean, professional, and modern style that aligns with the evolved brand aesthetic. Focus on clarity and concept reinforcement.
images.purpose: To break up text-heavy sections, improve readability, and visually represent key services and concepts.
